pageProps.title: Components
pageProps.description: Discover all the Agriculture Design System components here including visual examples, component props, and live code examples.

pkgList.title: A11y
pkgList.description: Utilities for improving accessibility.
pkgList.text: utilities for improving accessibility. foundations a11y

pkgList.title: AG branding
pkgList.description: A colour palette and logo set for Agriculture
pkgList.text: a colour palette and logo set for agriculture brand ag branding

pkgList.title: Accordion
pkgList.description: An accordion lets users show and hide sections of related content.
pkgList.text: an accordion lets users show and hide sections of related content. layout accordion

pkgList.title: App layout
pkgList.description: The app layout provides a consistent way for users to navigate around a web application and access their account settings.
pkgList.text: the app layout provides a consistent way for users to navigate around a web application and access their account settings. layout app layout

pkgList.title: Autocomplete
pkgList.description: Autocomplete, also known as type-ahead, uses predictive text to help select options as a user types.
pkgList.text: autocomplete, also known as type-ahead, uses predictive text to help select options as a user types. forms autocomplete

pkgList.title: Avatar
pkgList.description: User avatars help to quickly identify people in the system.
pkgList.text: user avatars help to quickly identify people in the system. content avatar

pkgList.title: Box
pkgList.description: A primitive layout component.
pkgList.text: a primitive layout component. foundations box

pkgList.title: Breadcrumbs
pkgList.description: Breadcrumbs show a user their location on a website so they can easily navigate to find what they need.
pkgList.text: breadcrumbs show a user their location on a website so they can easily navigate to find what they need. navigation breadcrumbs

pkgList.title: Button
pkgList.description: A button communicates an action to a user and indicates what will happen next.
pkgList.text: a button communicates an action to a user and indicates what will happen next. forms button

pkgList.title: Call to action
pkgList.description: Call to action links are interactive UI cues that direct users to other pages.
pkgList.text: call to action links are interactive ui cues that direct users to other pages. navigation call to action

pkgList.title: Callout
pkgList.description: Callouts are an excerpt of text used to draw attention to important or interesting information. They should not be confused with Page alerts.
pkgList.text: callouts are an excerpt of text used to draw attention to important or interesting information. they should not be confused with page alerts. content callout

pkgList.title: Card
pkgList.description: Cards are layout components used to link to more information or for secondary in-page navigation.
pkgList.text: cards are layout components used to link to more information or for secondary in-page navigation. layout card

pkgList.title: Checkbox
pkgList.description: Checkboxes allow users to select one or more options from a list.
pkgList.text: checkboxes allow users to select one or more options from a list. forms checkbox

pkgList.title: Columns
pkgList.description: Columns allows you to create a responsive layout grid.
pkgList.text: columns allows you to create a responsive layout grid. layout columns

pkgList.title: Combobox
pkgList.description: This component allows users to select from a list of options. It’s especially useful when there are many options to choose from.
pkgList.text: this component allows users to select from a list of options. it’s especially useful when there are many options to choose from. forms combobox

pkgList.title: Conditional field container
pkgList.description: A standardised pattern for conditionally hiding and revealing the amount of content a user views in a form.
pkgList.text: a standardised pattern for conditionally hiding and revealing the amount of content a user views in a form. forms conditional field container

pkgList.title: Content
pkgList.description: A collection of simple layout containers to wrap content.
pkgList.text: a collection of simple layout containers to wrap content. layout content

pkgList.title: Control group
pkgList.description: Control groups allow related checkboxes and radios to be grouped together.
pkgList.text: control groups allow related checkboxes and radios to be grouped together. forms control group

pkgList.title: Core
pkgList.description: Core includes a range of styles, variables and code that form the foundations of how the Design System works, including colour, typography and spacing.
pkgList.text: core includes a range of styles, variables and code that form the foundations of how the design system works, including colour, typography and spacing. foundations core

pkgList.title: Date picker
pkgList.description: The Date picker component allows users to select a single date via a calendar or text input.
pkgList.text: the date picker component allows users to select a single date via a calendar or text input. forms date picker

pkgList.title: Date picker (Next)
pkgList.description: The Date picker component allows users to select a single date via a calendar or text input.
pkgList.text: the date picker component allows users to select a single date via a calendar or text input. forms date picker (next)

pkgList.title: Date range picker
pkgList.description: The Date range picker component allows users to select a range of dates via a calendar or text input.
pkgList.text: the date range picker component allows users to select a range of dates via a calendar or text input. forms date range picker

pkgList.title: Date range picker (Next)
pkgList.description: The Date range picker component allows users to select a range of dates via a calendar or text input.
pkgList.text: the date range picker component allows users to select a range of dates via a calendar or text input. forms date range picker (next)

pkgList.title: Details
pkgList.description: The Details component hides non-essential content unless a user explicitly chooses to view it.
pkgList.text: the details component hides non-essential content unless a user explicitly chooses to view it. content details

pkgList.title: Direction link
pkgList.description: Direction links are links which communicate flow to other parts of a page or process.
pkgList.text: direction links are links which communicate flow to other parts of a page or process. navigation direction link

pkgList.title: Divider
pkgList.description: A horizontal rule that separates blocks of content.
pkgList.text: a horizontal rule that separates blocks of content. content divider

pkgList.title: Divider with text
pkgList.description: A horizontal rule used to visually separate content with a label.
pkgList.text: a horizontal rule used to visually separate content with a label. content divider with text

pkgList.title: Drawer
pkgList.description: A drawer is a panel that slides in from the right side of the screen. The Drawer is overlayed on top of the main area of the page to capture the user’s attention while keeping the context of the current task.
pkgList.text: a drawer is a panel that slides in from the right side of the screen. the drawer is overlayed on top of the main area of the page to capture the user’s attention while keeping the context of the current task. layout drawer

pkgList.title: Dropdown menu
pkgList.description: A dropdown menu displays a list of actions when a trigger is pressed.
pkgList.text: a dropdown menu displays a list of actions when a trigger is pressed. layout dropdown menu

pkgList.title: Feature link list
pkgList.description: Feature link list is a vertical list of important links. It adds prominence and additional information to help users find and understand the navigation items.
pkgList.text: feature link list is a vertical list of important links. it adds prominence and additional information to help users find and understand the navigation items. navigation feature link list

pkgList.title: Field
pkgList.description: The field package exposes the elements around form inputs, and an API to compose them.
pkgList.text: the field package exposes the elements around form inputs, and an api to compose them. forms field

pkgList.title: Fieldset
pkgList.description: The Fieldset component is used to group related form fields and includes a descriptive legend to label the group, helping users understand the relationship between these form fields.
pkgList.text: the fieldset component is used to group related form fields and includes a descriptive legend to label the group, helping users understand the relationship between these form fields. forms fieldset

pkgList.title: File input
pkgList.description: The File input component allows users to attach one file to a form field by browsing their device.
pkgList.text: the file input component allows users to attach one file to a form field by browsing their device. forms file input

pkgList.title: File upload
pkgList.description: The File upload component allows users to attach one or multiple files to a form via drag-and-drop or by browsing their device.
pkgList.text: the file upload component allows users to attach one or multiple files to a form via drag-and-drop or by browsing their device. forms file upload

pkgList.title: Filter sidebar
pkgList.description: Filter sidebar is used for displaying filtering options in a search result or catalogue page.
pkgList.text: filter sidebar is used for displaying filtering options in a search result or catalogue page. layout filter sidebar

pkgList.title: Flex
pkgList.description: A CSS flexbox version of the Box component.
pkgList.text: a css flexbox version of the box component. foundations flex

pkgList.title: Footer
pkgList.description: Footers live at the bottom of a page and help users find supplementary information relevant to their needs.
pkgList.text: footers live at the bottom of a page and help users find supplementary information relevant to their needs. layout footer

pkgList.title: Form stack
pkgList.description: The Form stack component is used to apply consistent vertical spacing between elements in forms.
pkgList.text: the form stack component is used to apply consistent vertical spacing between elements in forms. forms form stack

pkgList.title: Global alert
pkgList.description: Global alerts display prominent service or system wide messages at the top of the screen.
pkgList.text: global alerts display prominent service or system wide messages at the top of the screen. content global alert

pkgList.title: Grouped fields
pkgList.description: The Grouped fields component allows two closely related form inputs to be grouped together.
pkgList.text: the grouped fields component allows two closely related form inputs to be grouped together. forms grouped fields

pkgList.title: Header
pkgList.description: The Header is the masthead of our applications. It incorporates the Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry Coat of Arms logo and provides a user context on where they are.
pkgList.text: the header is the masthead of our applications. it incorporates the department of agriculture, fisheries and forestry coat of arms logo and provides a user context on where they are. layout header

pkgList.title: Heading
pkgList.description: Headings are a typographic component that create semantic structure, allow users to scan content by creating relative visual prominence and support search engine optimisation.
pkgList.text: headings are a typographic component that create semantic structure, allow users to scan content by creating relative visual prominence and support search engine optimisation. foundations heading

pkgList.title: Hero banner
pkgList.description: The hero banner sits at the top of the page under the Main nav and is used to grab a user’s attention.
pkgList.text: the hero banner sits at the top of the page under the main nav and is used to grab a user’s attention. layout hero banner

pkgList.title: Icon
pkgList.description: The Agriculture Design System supports the use of universal system icons. The icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system.
pkgList.text: the agriculture design system supports the use of universal system icons. the icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system. foundations icon

pkgList.title: Indicator dot
pkgList.description: Indicator dots are small, decorative, badge-like indicators used to call attention to an item, such as an unread message.
pkgList.text: indicator dots are small, decorative, badge-like indicators used to call attention to an item, such as an unread message. content indicator dot

pkgList.title: Inpage nav
pkgList.description: Also known as Page contents, Inpage nav links help users scan page contents and quickly navigate to different sections.
pkgList.text: also known as page contents, inpage nav links help users scan page contents and quickly navigate to different sections. navigation inpage nav

pkgList.title: Link list
pkgList.description: Link list is a simple set of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation and to order information for users.
pkgList.text: link list is a simple set of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation and to order information for users. navigation link list

pkgList.title: List
pkgList.description: Lists are vertical groupings of related items that can be displayed either in an unordered or ordered format.
pkgList.text: lists are vertical groupings of related items that can be displayed either in an unordered or ordered format. content list

pkgList.title: Loading
pkgList.description: Loading indicators inform users their action is being processed.
pkgList.text: loading indicators inform users their action is being processed. content loading

pkgList.title: Main nav
pkgList.description: The main nav is the primary way users navigate the user interface. It is consistently visible throughout the service.
pkgList.text: the main nav is the primary way users navigate the user interface. it is consistently visible throughout the service. navigation main nav

pkgList.title: Modal
pkgList.description: A modal is a dialog box that appears above the parent page and provides advance notice of a destructive action and consequence. They tell users a decision is needed.
pkgList.text: a modal is a dialog box that appears above the parent page and provides advance notice of a destructive action and consequence. they tell users a decision is needed. content modal

pkgList.title: Notification badge
pkgList.description: Notification badges are visual indicators for numeric values.
pkgList.text: notification badges are visual indicators for numeric values. content notification badge

pkgList.title: Page alert
pkgList.description: Page alerts are colour-coded, non-disruptive notifications that provide Success, Error, Warning or Information messages at relevant times during the user journey. They should not be confused with Callouts.
pkgList.text: page alerts are colour-coded, non-disruptive notifications that provide success, error, warning or information messages at relevant times during the user journey. they should not be confused with callouts. content page alert

pkgList.title: Pagination
pkgList.description: Pagination separates large amounts of content into separate pages, which helps reduce cognitive load.
pkgList.text: pagination separates large amounts of content into separate pages, which helps reduce cognitive load. navigation pagination

pkgList.title: Password input
pkgList.description: The password input component allows users to securely enter a password. The text is obscured by default, but can be revealed by pressing the ‘Show password’ checkbox.
pkgList.text: the password input component allows users to securely enter a password. the text is obscured by default, but can be revealed by pressing the ‘show password’ checkbox. forms password input

pkgList.title: Progress indicator
pkgList.description: Progress indicators show users the number of steps in a task, where they are up to in the process and how much is left to do.
pkgList.text: progress indicators show users the number of steps in a task, where they are up to in the process and how much is left to do. forms progress indicator

pkgList.title: Prose
pkgList.description: Provides typographic defaults for vanilla HTML.
pkgList.text: provides typographic defaults for vanilla html. content prose

pkgList.title: Radio
pkgList.description: Radios allow users to select one option from a list.
pkgList.text: radios allow users to select one option from a list. forms radio

pkgList.title: Search box
pkgList.description: An input that allows users to enter a keyword to search a website for specific content.
pkgList.text: an input that allows users to enter a keyword to search a website for specific content. forms search box

pkgList.title: Search input
pkgList.description: Search input enables users to enter a word or phrase to find relevant content.
pkgList.text: search input enables users to enter a word or phrase to find relevant content. forms search input

pkgList.title: Section alert
pkgList.description: Section alerts are non-disruptive notifications that provide Success, Error, Warning, Information and Progress messages about a state change in a section of a page.
pkgList.text: section alerts are non-disruptive notifications that provide success, error, warning, information and progress messages about a state change in a section of a page. content section alert

pkgList.title: Select
pkgList.description: Select provides a way for users to choose one item from a collapsible list. It helps reduce input errors and screen space.
pkgList.text: select provides a way for users to choose one item from a collapsible list. it helps reduce input errors and screen space. forms select

pkgList.title: Side nav
pkgList.description: A vertical list of links used for site navigation, typically placed beside body content.
pkgList.text: a vertical list of links used for site navigation, typically placed beside body content. navigation side nav

pkgList.title: Skeleton
pkgList.description: Skeletons are visual placeholders for information while data is still loading.
pkgList.text: skeletons are visual placeholders for information while data is still loading. content skeleton

pkgList.title: Skip link
pkgList.description: Skip links are internal page links that aid navigation around a page. They are accessible by screen reader and keyboard users, and help users quickly jump to and over content on the page.
pkgList.text: skip links are internal page links that aid navigation around a page. they are accessible by screen reader and keyboard users, and help users quickly jump to and over content on the page. navigation skip link

pkgList.title: Stack
pkgList.description: Stack is a primitive layout component used to distribute items vertically with even spacing.
pkgList.text: stack is a primitive layout component used to distribute items vertically with even spacing. foundations stack

pkgList.title: Status badge
pkgList.description: Status badges are visual indicators used to highlight an item’s status for quick recognition.
pkgList.text: status badges are visual indicators used to highlight an item’s status for quick recognition. content status badge

pkgList.title: Sub nav
pkgList.description: A horizontal list of links typically placed between the main navigation and page content.
pkgList.text: a horizontal list of links typically placed between the main navigation and page content. navigation sub nav

pkgList.title: Summary list
pkgList.description: Summary list is used to summarise information such as a user’s responses at the end of a form.
pkgList.text: summary list is used to summarise information such as a user’s responses at the end of a form. content summary list

pkgList.title: Switch
pkgList.description: A Switch allows a user to immediately toggle interface settings.
pkgList.text: a switch allows a user to immediately toggle interface settings. forms switch

pkgList.title: Table
pkgList.description: Tables help make complex information easier to scan and compare. Use tables for exact values or information that would be hard to read in body text.
pkgList.text: tables help make complex information easier to scan and compare. use tables for exact values or information that would be hard to read in body text. content table

pkgList.title: Tabs
pkgList.description: Tabs are used to categorise content into seperate views. A user can navigate between each section of content, displaying one section at a time.
pkgList.text: tabs are used to categorise content into seperate views. a user can navigate between each section of content, displaying one section at a time. layout tabs

pkgList.title: Tags
pkgList.description: Tags classify content using keywords or labels. They are added to a web page, asset or content to help users search for related content quickly and easily.
pkgList.text: tags classify content using keywords or labels. they are added to a web page, asset or content to help users search for related content quickly and easily. content tags

pkgList.title: Task list
pkgList.description: Task list is a navigation tool that show users what input is required to complete a task or transaction.
pkgList.text: task list is a navigation tool that show users what input is required to complete a task or transaction. forms task list

pkgList.title: Text
pkgList.description: A primitive typographic component for constrained text styles.
pkgList.text: a primitive typographic component for constrained text styles. foundations text

pkgList.title: Text input
pkgList.description: This component allows users to enter free-form text.
pkgList.text: this component allows users to enter free-form text. forms text input

pkgList.title: Text link
pkgList.description: A typographic component for creating hyperlinks.
pkgList.text: a typographic component for creating hyperlinks. navigation text link

pkgList.title: Textarea
pkgList.description: A text area lets users enter long-form, plain text over multiple lines and is commonly found in forms.
pkgList.text: a text area lets users enter long-form, plain text over multiple lines and is commonly found in forms. forms textarea

pkgList.title: Time input
pkgList.description: The Time input component allows users to enter a time in multiple formats.
pkgList.text: the time input component allows users to enter a time in multiple formats. forms time input

pkgList.title: Time picker
pkgList.description: The Time picker component allows users to easily select a time from a list of options.
pkgList.text: the time picker component allows users to easily select a time from a list of options. forms time picker

pkgList.title: Toggle button
pkgList.description: Toggle button is a two-state button that represents and performs an on/off state.
pkgList.text: toggle button is a two-state button that represents and performs an on/off state. forms toggle button
